Landing.b2bSubtitle: At LOKMA, we value the work of our vendors. No hidden fees, no complicated contracts. Just growth and fair earnings.
Landing.b2bTitle: Standing by Vendors, on the Path to the Future.
Landing.copyright: Â© 2024 LOKMA Platform. All rights reserved.
Landing.discoverSubtitle: Local shops, fresh products, fast delivery. Fresh. Fast. Local.
Landing.easyManagementDesc: Control everything with the user-friendly mobile panel.
Landing.fairCommissionDesc: We protect your earnings with the lowest rates in the industry.
Landing.faq1A: LOKMA is a digital marketplace that brings together local vendors and customers. Butchers, markets, florists and more on one platform.
Landing.faq2A: Download the app, select your location and discover the nearest businesses. Add products to your cart and complete your order with secure payment.
Landing.faq3A: Delivery fees vary by region and business. The delivery fee is clearly shown before ordering.
Landing.faq3Q: How much is the delivery fee?
Landing.faq4A: Click "Become a Partner" and fill out the application form. Our team will contact you within 24 hours.
Landing.faq4Q: How can I join as a vendor?
Landing.fastPaymentDesc: Manage your cash flow with instant payment systems instead of weekly.
Landing.heroSubtitle: More than delivery â€“ your local marketplace for fresh products, restaurants and homemade specialties. Fresh. Fast. Local.
Landing.wideAudienceDesc: Reach thousands of customers in your area with our digital advertising power.
